rationale: Current error handling shows raw error values without context or remediation guidance. Well-designed CLI tools (like rustc, gh, kubectl) provide rich error messages that help users self-diagnose and resolve issues without external documentation.
problemSolved: Errors display as 'Error: <raw message>' (shell.go lines 109, 116). Backend availability errors show bullet points but no actionable steps (main.go lines 131-133). Agent creation failures show 'failed: %v' without context (main.go line 187).
